def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    if a[0] > m:
        print(-1)
        return
    i = 0
    day = 0
    while m > 0:
        m -= a[i]
        i += 1
        day += 1
    print(day)
        
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    a.reverse()
    #print(a)
    if sum(a) < m:
        print(-1)
    else:
        days = 0
        i = 0
        while m > 0:
            m -= a[i]
            i += 1
            days += 1
        print(days)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n,m=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
a.sort()
a.reverse()
s=0
i=0
while s<m:
    s+=a[i]
    i+=1
if s==m:
    print(i)
else:
    print(-1)

# cook your dish here
n,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
a.sort()
c = 0
for i in range(n):
    m-=a[i]
    if m<=0:
        break
    c+=1
if m<=0:
    print(c+1)
else:
    print(-1)
